member.name: T:HSZProcessor.Core
member.summary: This class represents where you should run your application logic

member.name: M:HSZProcessor.Core.DoWork
member.summary: Loop until cancellation is requested, doing the primary work of this service

member.name: M:HSZProcessor.Core.OnStop
member.summary: Request the core worker to stop

member.name: M:HSZProcessor.Core.TaskException(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: An exception occurred on the main task; log it and shut down the service with an error exit code

member.name: M:HSZProcessor.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The entry point into the Windows Service. You can also run this program as a console app if you pass "-console" as the first parameter.
member.remarks: Setup the Debug command line arguments in your Project properties to include "-console" so that you can debug your service.

member.name: P:SentryWindowsServiceTemplateCSharp.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
